titles.title: A bill to provide for the implementation of private sector funding for certain refugees.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration and Refugee Affairs.

bill.summary: 7/8/1988--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of State and the Director of the Office of Refugee Resettlement to issue guidelines for the admission into the United States of refugees for whom private sector funding is available.
